rare.name: SPECTRAL SLUGS
rare.description: Using [Shadow Step] restores 100% of your ammo.

epic.name: ONSLAUGHT
epic.description: Every 3rd shot fires both of your [Hellfire Shotguns]. The extra shot does not consume ammo but deals 80% reduced damage.

epic.name: NIGHTCREEPER
epic.description: Using [Wraith Form] reduces the cooldown of [Shadow Step] by 2s.

epic.name: CROWD CONTROL
epic.description: [Death Blossom] gains 5% Ability Power for each enemy within its range.

rare.name: DEVASTATION
rare.description: Each [Death Blossom] elimination increases your Health by 25 until the end of the round, up to 100 Health.

rare.name: NEVERFROST
rare.description: Reduce effectiveness of enemy slows by 50%.

rare.name: POCKET MIST
rare.description: While below 50% Life, gain 20% Move Speed.

epic.name: WRETCHED WINGS
epic.description: While using [Wraith Form], gain the ability to fly and gain 20% Move Speed.

epic.name: CRIMSON CLOAK
epic.description: Using [Death Blossom] grants you Overhealth equal to 15% of your max Life.

powers.title: BACKSTABBER
powers.description: After using an ability, your next shot deals 50% additional damage over 3s to enemies struck from behind.

powers.title: HARVEST FEST
powers.description: [Hellfire Shotgun] hits have a 10% chance to spawn a Soul Globe. When picked up, restore 25% Life, 25% Ammo, and gain 25% Move Speed for 3s.

powers.title: REVOLVING RUIN
powers.description: Close-range (7m) [Hellfire Shotgun] hits grant 5% Attack Speed for Is, stacking up to 8 times.

powers.title: SHARED SIPHON
powers.description: [The Reaping] also heals the nearest ally within 10m for 30% of Reaper's damage dealt.

powers.title: SHROUDED SHRAPNEL
powers.description: Using [Wraith Form] increases the number of pellets per shot in your next magazine by 25% and its spread by 50%.

powers.title: VAMPIRIC TOUCH
powers.description: Hits with [Quick Melee] mark enemies for 5s. Allies gain 20% Lifesteal against marked enemies.

powers.title: DEATH STEP
powers.description: After using [Shadow Step], cast [Death Blossom] for 1.5s with 50% reduced damage.

powers.title: SILENT AS THE GRAVE
powers.description: Your footsteps and [Shadow Step] are significantly quieter.

powers.title: STRANGLE STEP
powers.description: After using [Shadow Step], double your Lifesteal for 3s.

powers.title: GHOSTED
powers.description: While in [Wraith Form], passing through enemies slows their Move Speed and Attack Speed by 30% for 3s.

powers.title: WRAITH RENEWAL
powers.description: While in [Wraith Form], restore 10% of your Life every Is. Double this while below 50% Life.
